description: This PHP file is part of a web application for configuring Wi-Fi settings during a Home Network Wizard. It includes PHP logic for retrieving current Wi-Fi configurations, dynamically generates HTML forms, and includes JavaScript for form validation and user interaction.

methods.name: set_config
methods.description: Sends configuration data via AJAX to update Wi-Fi settings and handles the response.

methods.name: click_save
methods.description: Collects form data, prepares JSON configuration, and invokes set_config to save changes.
